mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_NO, CHAT_ROOM_NO, WRITER_ID, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(MESSAGE, 4000, 1) AS MESSAGE, IS_READ, CREATE_DATE, CHAT_TIME FROM CHAT WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo} ORDER BY CHAT_TIME ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT (CHAT_NO, CHAT_ROOM_NO, WRITER_ID, MESSAGE, CREATE_DATE, CHAT_TIME) VALUES ( SEQ_CHAT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{chatRoomNo}, #{writerId}, #{message}, SYSDATE, SYSTIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_NO, CHAT_ROOM_NO, WRITER_ID, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(MESSAGE, 4000, 1) AS MESSAGE, IS_READ, CREATE_DATE, CHAT_TIME FROM CHAT c JOIN CHAT_ROOM cr ON c.CHAT_ROOM_NO = cr.CHAT_ROOM_NO WHERE cr.USER1_ID = #{userId} OR cr.USER2_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY CHAT_TIME DESC

SELECT * FROM CHAT WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = ( SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM WHERE ((USER1_ID = #{writerId} AND USER2_ID = #{receiverId}) OR (USER1_ID = #{receiverId} AND USER2_ID = #{writerId})) ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) ORDER BY CHAT_NO ASC
SELECT CHAT_NO, CHAT_ROOM_NO, WRITER_ID, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(MESSAGE, 4000, 1) AS MESSAGE, IS_READ, CREATE_DATE, CHAT_TIME FROM CHAT WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo} ORDER BY CHAT_TIME ASC
